item.title: Shankkar add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "In the unlikely story that is America, there has never been anything false about hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Shankkar add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Shankkar add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Donâ€™t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Shankkar add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress." -- Barack Obama
